Update.Changes: Added ability to modify single uninstallers Merged update to Portugeese translation by Nauta Update Spanish installer translation Fixed searching for uninstallers in install directories not working Fixed startup loading hanging when main window is minimized Fixed portable log cleaner running during updates Fixed possible crash when updates fail Decreased uninstall simulation time Installer .Net downloading improvements Added info about downloading UpdateSystem library to readme Increased priority for Msiexec uninstall string generator
